property.name: Parent
property.tp:docstring: The object path of the parent device.

property.name: Mode
property.tp:docstring: The macvlan mode, one of "private", "vepa", "bridge", or "passthru".

property.name: NoPromisc
property.tp:docstring: Whether the device is blocked from going into promiscuous mode.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping property names to variant boxed values
